net.co.java.model

Interface Model

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractModel, Mock, PostgreSQL

    public interface Model
    Administrators of this private server should be able to use a database of their own preference, for instance using MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLLite, using Java serialization or static mock data. This interface is a stub for models that provide access to the data model.
    Author:
    Jan-Willem Gmelig Meyling
